title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: A special series of Polymerbits that were commissioned by user phishead to help promote Monero (XMR)This was the first series produced which follows the Monero naming of updates.These are the "Boron Butterfly" series and set #31 out of 100 producedEach note is loaded with face value of 100 mXMR and 200 mXMR respectively.STARTING BID: 0.0050BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JULY 12th, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: minerjones
